profileUrl.name: profileUrl
profileUrl.description:
A fully qualified URL pointing to a page
representing the User's online profile.

entitlements.name: entitlements
entitlements.description: A list of entitlements for the User that represent a thing the User has.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of an entitlement.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute.  The primary
attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

x509Certificates.name: x509Certificates
x509Certificates.description: A list of certificates issued to the User.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of an X.509 certificate.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute.The primary attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

preferredLanguage.name: preferredLanguage
preferredLanguage.description:
Indicates the User's preferred written or
spoken language.  Generally used for selecting a localized user interface; e.g., 'en_US' specifies the language English and country

addresses.name: addresses
addresses.description:
A physical mailing address for this User.
Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.  This attribute is a complex type with the following sub-attributes.

subAttributes.name: formatted
subAttributes.description:
The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label.  This attribute MAY contain
newlines.

subAttributes.name: streetAddress
subAttributes.description:
The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line
extended street address information.  This attribute MAY contain newlines.

subAttributes.name: locality
subAttributes.description: The city or locality component.

subAttributes.name: region
subAttributes.description: The state or region component.

subAttributes.name: postalCode
subAttributes.description: The zip code or postal code component.

subAttributes.name: country
subAttributes.description: The country name component.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute.  The primary
attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.description:
The name of the User, suitable for display
to end-users.  The name SHOULD be the full name of the User being described, if known.

nickName.name: nickName
nickName.description:
The casual way to address the user in real life, e.g., 'Bob' or 'Bobby' instead of 'Robert'.  This attribute
SHOULD NOT be used to represent a User's username (e.g., 'bjensen' or 'mpepperidge').

timezone.name: timezone
timezone.description:
The User's time zone in the 'Olson' time zone
database format, e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles'.

roles.name: roles
roles.description: A list of roles for the User that collectively represent who the User is, e.g., 'Student', 'Faculty'.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of a role.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute.  The primary attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

externalId.name: externalId
externalId.description: A String that is an identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client. The service provider MUST always interpret the externalId as scoped to the provisioning domain.

active.name: active
active.description: A Boolean value indicating the User's administrative status.

groups.name: groups
groups.description:
A list of groups to which the user belongs,
either through direct membership, through nested groups, or dynamically calculated.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The identifier of the User's group.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The uri of the corresponding 'Group' resource to which the user belongs.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes. READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'direct' or 'indirect'.

userName.name: userName
userName.description:
A service provider's unique identifier for the user, typically
used by the user to directly authenticate to the service provider.Each User MUST include a non-empty userName value.  This identifier
MUST be unique across the service provider's entire set of Users.

title.name: title
title.description: The user's title, such as \"Vice President.\"

locale.name: locale
locale.description:
Used to indicate the User's default location
for purposes of localizing items such as currency, date time format, or numerical representations.

phoneNumbers.name: phoneNumbers
phoneNumbers.description:
Phone numbers for the User.  The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider according to the
format specified in RFC 3966, e.g., 'tel:+1-201-555-0123'.Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', 'mobile', 'fax', 'pager

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Phone number of the User.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work', 'home', 'mobile'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the preferred
phone number or primary phone number.  The primary attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

emails.name: emails
emails.description:
Email addresses for the user.  The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g.,
'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'.Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description:
Email addresses for the user.  The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g.,
'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'.Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the psreferred mailing address or primary email address.  The primary attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

password.name: password
password.description:
The User's cleartext password.  This attribute is intended to be used as a means to specify an initial
password when creating a new User or to reset an existing User's password.

meta.name: meta
meta.description: A complex attribute containing resource metadata.

subAttributes.name: resourceType
subAttributes.description: The name of the resource type of the resource.

subAttributes.name: created
subAttributes.description: The "DateTime" that the resource was added to the service provider.

subAttributes.name: lastModified
subAttributes.description: The most recent DateTime that the details of this resource were updated at the service provider.

subAttributes.name: location
subAttributes.description: Location  The uri of the resource being returned

subAttributes.name: version
subAttributes.description: The version of the resource being returned.

name.name: name
name.description:
The components of the user's real name.Providers MAY return just the full name as a single string in the
formatted sub-attribute, or they MAY return just the individual component attributes using the other sub-attributes, or they MAY
return both.  If both variants are returned, they SHOULD be describing the same name, with the formatted name indicating how the
component attributes should be combined.

subAttributes.name: formatted
subAttributes.description:
The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display
(e.g., 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: familyName
subAttributes.description:
The family name of the User, or last name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Jensen' given the full
name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: givenName
subAttributes.description:
The given name of the User, or first name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Barbara' given the
full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: middleName
subAttributes.description: The middle name(s) of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: honorificPrefix
subAttributes.description:
The honorific prefix(es) of the User, or title in most Western languages (e.g., 'Ms.' given the full name
'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: honorificSuffix
subAttributes.description:
The honorific suffix(es) of the User, or suffix in most Western languages (e.g., 'III' given the full name
'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

id.name: id
id.description: Unique identifier for the SCIM Resource as defined by the Service Provider.
